short_summary: Installation of New Lockers and Modifications requires a competitive open bidding process
tags: building and facility maintenance and repair services Ownridge
full_summary:
=====================================

**Installation of New Lockers and Modifications**

**Notice #**: WS4385931127 / Doc4387031929

**Publication Date**: January 9, 2024

**RFP Closing Date**: February 6, 2024, 14:00 EST

**Objective**: To invite qualified contractors to submit proposals for the installation of new lockers and modifications at various Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) locations.

**Scope of Work**:
The project involves the installation of new lockers and various modifications at PSPC facilities in Ottawa. The successful contractor will be responsible for the delivery, installation, and commissioning of the lockers, as well as any necessary modifications to the existing infrastructure.

**Key Requirements**:

* Installation of new lockers
* Modifications to existing infrastructure
* Compliance with PSPC specifications and standards

**Selection Criteria**: Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Tendering Method**: This tender is subject to a competitive, open bidding process.

**Submission Requirements**:

* Respondents must submit their proposal in accordance with the instructions outlined in the relevant documents (WS4385931127-Doc4387031929)
* Proposals must include a detailed description of the work, including the installation of new lockers and modifications
* Proposals must also include the proposed methodology, timelines, and any other relevant information

**Contact Information**:

* Canadian Industry Information Exchange (CIIX), TPSGC-PWGSC (Jonathan Bullard)
* Email: jonathan.bullard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18464551?extsite=MTg0NjQ1NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
